review: I was so grateful for the support of the Trademark Helpline when securing the trademark for my business recently. From the initial call throughout the entire process, Matt and the team made it so easy. I was totally bamboozled by the various classes etc, so having them to work through it with meant that my trademark was set up correctly and will stand my business in good stead for the future. Thanks so much!

I can not thank the TRADEMARK HELPLINE enough! This was my first time going through the trademark process. This brand means the world to me and I couldn't have chosen better people to trust with the process. It has been a very smooth process, they have understood my goals and wishes perfectly and have now enabled me to really push on and officially launch my brand with peace of mind. Thanks again!

reply.text: What an amazing review Reece! You've highlighted exactly why we do what we do - to help busy founders focus on launching their business without the worry of the rug being pulled. Looking forward to seeing yours blossom!

review: Great all round service. Helped apply for my trademark and then protect it from infringements. Would highly recommend

reply.text: Thanks Maithem, it's so important to keep watch after registration as that's when the real value of a trademark comes through!

review: Alex was great! Sorted everything I needed to trademark my business - would definitely recommend! Thank you Alex :)

reply.text: Thanks for the great feedback, Alex is a gem!

review: For someone starting up my own brand for the very first time they made it really easy and did alot of the work for me. Communication was very good and kept me upto date with everything. Very professional

reply.text: Thanks Ryan, starting a business is difficult enough, especially at the moment! Glad we could at least make this vital step of the process easy for you.

review: Absolutely exceeded my expectations. From start to finish, the experience was smooth, professional, and surprisingly refreshing. You can tell they really care about what they do. I've already recommended them to a few people and will definitely be back again. One of those rare findsâ€”worth every bit of the hype.

reply.text: Wow, thanks Aaron! We look forward to working with you again, hopefully very soon!
